thread.title: Good for Business Trips
thread.title_full: Good for Business Trips - Review of Premier Inn London Hanger Lane Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: GÃ¶khan T
title: Good for Business Trips
text:
The Location is very close to the tube so you could reach anywhere in the city. Hotel is new compared to the other alternatives. Very clean. You may have your dinner inside the hotel as well.
I changed my hotel from another very old hotel to this one and this was a good choice.
